title: Remove ASHA PF CONSULTANCY logo from hero and favicon

requirements.summary: Remove the logo image from the Hero section and rebalance spacing so the hero still feels intentional.
acceptanceCriteria: The hero section no longer renders an for the logo (currently /assets/generated/asha-pf-logo-transparent.dim_1200x300.png).
The hero layout still looks intentional on mobile and desktop (no empty spacing where the logo used to be).

file_operations.description: Remove the Hero-section logo that references /assets/generated/asha-pf-logo-transparent.dim_1200x300.png, and adjust the surrounding layout (e.g., spacing/alignment in the hero text stack) so there is no awkward gap where the logo was. Verify there are no other hero-area references to the generated logo assets.

requirements.summary: Stop using the generated logo favicon asset so the browser tab icon is no longer the ASHA PF CONSULTANCY logo.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html no longer references /assets/generated/asha-pf-favicon-transparent.dim_64x64.png as the favicon.
After the change, the browser tab icon is no longer the ASHA PF CONSULTANCY logo (it may fall back to the browser default if no replacement is provided).

file_operations.description: Remove (or replace with a non-logo alternative) the <link rel='icon'> reference to /assets/generated/asha-pf-favicon-transparent.dim_64x64.png so the site no longer uses the generated logo favicon asset. Do not delete the generated favicon files; only stop referencing them.
